## bdk steps i-evict

I evict <reference>

### Synopsis

Evicts the referenced pod resource. Step will fail if the pod reference was not defined in a previous step.

```
bdk steps i-evict [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  
  When I evict pod
    | grace period seconds | 120 |

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for i-evict
```

